sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for operating the FTIR Spectrophotometer for functional group analysis.
sections.scope: Applicable to analysis carried out in the Central Instrumentation Facility.
procedure: Ensure the FTIR instrument is clean and free from dust.
Switch ON the instrument and allow it to stabilize.
Prepare the sample using suitable method (e.g., KBr pellet or ATR).
Place the background sample and record background spectrum.
Place the test sample in the sample holder.
Save and interpret the spectrum as required.
sections.precautions: Handle IR windows and crystals carefully. Avoid moisture contamination.
